模块 Fianalproject
程序包 application

类 Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
application.Main
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application
The main application entry point, which initializes and sets up the main interface, menu bar, and interactions with RobotArena and RobotCanvas.
版本:
1.0
作者:
[SHEN FANGJIE]
